about_the_game:
Story

Several months ago, a sinister shadow claimed the lives of two military submarines, vanishing them into the unfathomable depths of the ocean. Suspicions run deep, pointing to an aquatic entity of unparalleled terror.

Your mission: descend to the perilous abyss in a compact submarine and extract knowledge about this nameless creature without becoming its next victim.

Will you come back alive, or will the abyss swallow you whole?

Features


  • Your submarine has three outside cameras and a compass, use them for navigation.
  • Navigate the abyss on your terms in your submarine to explore and investigate.
  • Multiples signals and unusual activities were founded by the battleship radar, the coordinates are yours to use.
  • Use the hatch to swim to place the submarine can't reach and find clues.

One important rule, DON'T WANDER TOO FAR AWAY FROM THE SUBMARINE!


Warning : This game contains flickering lights and visual FX, which may cause discomfort or seizures in sensitive individuals. Player discretion is advised.
